entries.title: Core Materials & Production
entries.summary: All ships use the five core minerals.
entries.content: All ships require the five core minerals in varying amounts: Ferrite Alloy (hulls), Crytite (energy storage), Ardanium (FTL reinforcement), Vornite (electronics), Zerothium (warp stability). Specialized minerals are role-specific. Regional spawn bias makes trade and control essential.

entries.title: Shipyard & Roles
entries.summary: Build by class; filter by role.
entries.content: Use the Shipyard to build Frigates, Battleships, and Capitals. Filter by roles like stealth, brawler, sniper, ECM, carrier, miner, and logistics to find the right fit. Each blueprint lists specialized minerals.

entries.title: Welcome, Commander
entries.summary: A quick primer for new players.
entries.content:
**Welcome to Starfront: Dominion!**

This short guide covers the basics:
- Select your ship and set a destination with the map.
- Warp to points of interest like belts and nebulae.
- Mine resources (rock, gas, energy) and haul them back.
- Use stations to store, build, and expand.

Open other tabs on the left to learn about ships, stations, resources, and core rules. Good luck, Commander!

entries.title: Explorer Ship
entries.content:
The Explorer is a versatile scouting vessel.

“The Explorer is the ship equivalent of a multitool — it’s not the best knife, not the best screwdriver, and certainly not the best hammer… but in a pinch, it’s something. Built for new captains with shallow pockets and big dreams.”

**Highlights**
- Scan Range: 50
- Speed: 4
- Cargo: 10

Use it to find belts, nebulae, and opportunities.

entries.title: Starbase
entries.content: The Starbase serves as your central hub: storage, building, and upgrades.

entries.title: Storage Box
entries.content: Portable storage you can deploy near operations.

entries.title: Warp Beacon
entries.content: Provides a warp destination; some may be public.

entries.title: Interstellar Gate
entries.content: Jump between sectors via stable gates.

entries.title: Ferrite Alloy
entries.content: Primary hull metal for frames, armor, and ship plating. Universal bottleneck for shipbuilding.

entries.title: Crytite
entries.content: Energy storage crystal for reactors and weapon capacitors. Vital to all ships.

entries.title: Ardanium
entries.content: Structural reinforcement alloy to prevent FTL hull stress.

entries.title: Vornite
entries.content: Electronic-grade conductor for navigation and targeting systems.

entries.title: Zerothium
entries.content: Warp stabilizer material for long-range drives.

entries.title: Spectrathene
entries.content: Core stealth material for cloaks and sensor dampening.

entries.title: Auralite
entries.content: Precision sensor and targeting enhancement crystal.

entries.title: Gravium
entries.content: Heavy element for gravity-based weapons and tractor systems.

entries.title: Fluxium
entries.content: Agile FTL tuning crystal, used for speed boosts and interceptors.

entries.title: Corvexite
entries.content: Plasma and hull-piercing munitions core.

entries.title: Voidglass
entries.content: Elite stealth hull coating material.

entries.title: Heliox Ore
entries.content: Life support and colony atmosphere material.

entries.title: Neurogel
entries.content: Neural interface substrate for AI cores and drone control.

entries.title: Phasegold
entries.content: Teleportation and phase-cloak resonator metal.

entries.title: Kryon Dust
entries.content: Cryogenic stasis and missile cooling agent.

entries.title: Riftstone
entries.content: Wormhole and dimensional stability crystal.

entries.title: Solarite
entries.content: High-energy fuel for lasers and energy stations.

entries.title: Mythrion
entries.content: Ultra-light structural alloy for high-speed ships.

entries.title: Drakonium
entries.content: Plasma weapon core and heavy artillery material.

entries.title: Aetherium
entries.content: Long-range communication and command relay crystal.

entries.title: Tachytrium
entries.content: FTL overdrive mineral for extreme speed.

entries.title: Oblivium
entries.content: Energy-absorption armor plating material.

entries.title: Luminite
entries.content: High-efficiency shield generator crystal.

entries.title: Cryphos
entries.content: Electromagnetic weapon capacitor mineral.

entries.title: Pyronex
entries.content: Thermal lance and heat-based weapon core.

entries.title: Nebryllium
entries.content: Sensor jamming and false signal generation mineral.

entries.title: Magnetrine
entries.content: Magnetic railgun and tractor system component.

entries.title: Quarzon
entries.content: Multi-spectrum targeting and optics material.

entries.title: Starforged Carbon
entries.content: Dense armor plating material for capital ships.

entries.title: Aurivex
entries.content: Prestige alloy for elite diplomatic ships.

entries.title: Rock
entries.content: Legacy common construction material.

entries.title: Gas
entries.content: Legacy nebula gas used historically.

entries.title: Energy
entries.content: Legacy energy nodes around stars.

entries.title: Salvage
entries.content: Recovered tech and components from derelicts.

entries.title: Explorer (Frigate)
entries.content: Fast scout with strong sensors and exploration kit.

entries.title: Turns & Locking
entries.content: Plan your moves, then lock your turn. The server resolves movement, mining, and scanning in phases.

entries.title: Scanning & Visibility
entries.content: Scan range reveals objects; active scan extends range at an energy cost.

entries.title: Mining
entries.content: Mine from resource nodes until depleted. Dense hotspots boost player interaction and efficiency.

entries.title: Movement & Warp
entries.content: Move tile-by-tile or warp to fields and gates. Interstellar travel requires proximity to a gate.

entries.title: Asteroid Belts
entries.content: Belts contain clusters of rock near warp entry. Expect competition and rich deposits.

entries.title: Nebulae
entries.content: Nebula clusters and filaments appear near warp entry; great for gas harvesting.

entries.title: Stars
entries.content: Energy nodes spawn in safe orbital zones around stars.

entries.title: Derelicts
entries.content: Old structures with salvage and exploration hooks.
